description: Conversation where the user requests a 20‑item minimalist capsule wardrobe, and StyleMate compiles items from the user’s existing closet, suggests new pieces, and provides purchase links for the missing items.

messages.content: You are StyleMate, an agentic AI personal stylist. You have access to tools for managing the user’s wardrobe, retrieving body measurements, fashion trends, weather, generating outfits, and looking up purchase links. Respond in a helpful, concise, and friendly tone.
Hey StyleMate, I want a minimalist capsule wardrobe limited to 20 items. Can you put one together for me?
Got it! I’ll look at your current closet, your body measurements, and the latest minimalist trends, then suggest a 20‑piece capsule. Give me a moment while I fetch that information.

Thanks for waiting! Based on your current pieces (10 items) and the autumn minimalist trends, I’ve drafted a 20‑item capsule. Your closet already covers many basics, so I only need to add a few key pieces. Below are the suggested items – I’ve marked the ones you already own with ✅ and the new purchases with 🛒.

**Tops (6)**
1. ✅ Gray crewneck sweater (w1)
2. ✅ White t‑shirt (w3)
3. ✅ Grey hoodie (w9)
4. 🛒 White cotton button‑down shirt (new)
5. 🛒 Black silk camisole (new)
6. 🛒 Light beige long‑sleeve tee (new)

**Bottoms (5)**
7. ✅ Navy chinos (w2)
8. ✅ Black leggings (w4)
9. 🛒 Black slim trousers (new)
10. 🛒 Mid‑length beige skirt (new)
11. 🛒 Light denim cropped jeans (new)

**Outerwear (3)**
12. ✅ Denim jacket (w5)
13. ✅ Beige trench coat (w6)
14. 🛒 Lightweight trench coat in camel (new)

**Shoes (3)**
15. ✅ Black loafers (w8)
16. ✅ White sneakers (w10)
17. 🛒 White leather sneakers (new)

**Accessories (3)**
18. ✅ Silver necklace (w7)
19. 🛒 Minimalist leather belt (new)
20. 🛒 Structured black tote (new)

I’ll now look up purchase options for the eight new items. Give me a second.

Here’s the finalized 20‑item minimalist capsule wardrobe, with links for the items you’ll need to add:

**Tops**
- ✅ Gray crewneck sweater (w1)
- ✅ White t‑shirt (w3)
- ✅ Grey hoodie (w9)
- 🛒 *White cotton button‑down shirt* – [Uniqlo](${{{"title":"White Cotton Button‑Down Shirt","price":45,"retailer":"Uniqlo","url":"https://example.com/uniqlocottonshirt"}}}), [Everlane](${{{"title":"Organic White Poplin Shirt","price":60,"retailer":"Everlane","url":"https://example.com/everlanewhitepoplin"}}}), [COS](${{{"title":"Minimalist White Shirt","price":55,"retailer":"COS","url":"https://example.com/coswhite"}}})
- 🛒 *Black silk camisole* – [J.Crew](${{{"title":"Black Silk Camisole","price":85,"retailer":"J.Crew","url":"https://example.com/jcrewbliacksilk"}}}), [Everlane](${{{"title":"Silk Camisole","price":95,"retailer":"Everlane","url":"https://example.com/everlanesilk"}}}), [Aritzia](${{{"title":"Black Silk Top","price":90,"retailer":"Aritzia","url":"https://example.com/aritziasilk"}}})
- 🛒 *Light beige long‑sleeve tee* – [Uniqlo](${{{"title":"Light Beige Long‑Sleeve Tee","price":38,"retailer":"Uniqlo","url":"https://example.com/uniqlobeige"}}}), [Madewell](${{{"title":"Beige Ribbed Tee","price":55,"retailer":"Madewell","url":"https://example.com/madewellbeigette"}}}), [COS](${{{"title":"Beige Lightweight Tee","price":50,"retailer":"COS","url":"https://example.com/cosbeigette"}}})

**Bottoms**
- ✅ Navy chinos (w2)
- ✅ Black leggings (w4)
- 🛒 *Black slim trousers* – [Banana Republic](${{{"title":"Black Slim Trousers","price":80,"retailer":"Banana Republic","url":"https://example.com/bananarepblacktrousers"}}}), [J.Crew](${{{"title":"Classic Black Tailored Pants","price":95,"retailer":"J.Crew","url":"https://example.com/jcrewblackpants"}}}), [Patagonia](${{{"title":"Eco‑Friendly Black Trousers","price":70,"retailer":"Patagonia","url":"https://example.com/patagoniablacktrousers"}}})
- 🛒 *Mid‑length beige skirt* – [Mango](${{{"title":"Beige Mid‑Length Skirt","price":70,"retailer":"Mango","url":"https://example.com/mangobeigeskirt"}}}), [& Other Stories](${{{"title":"Structured Beige Skirt","price":75,"retailer":"& Other Stories","url":"https://example.com/otherstoriesbeigeskirt"}}}), [Arket](${{{"title":"Minimalist Beige Skirt","price":68,"retailer":"Arket","url":"https://example.com/arketbeigeskirt"}}})
- 🛒 *Light denim cropped jeans* – [Levi's](${{{"title":"Light Denim Cropped Jeans","price":85,"retailer":"Levi's","url":"https://example.com/leviscroppedjeans"}}}), [Madewell](${{{"title":"Cropped Denim Jeans","price":90,"retailer":"Madewell","url":"https://example.com/madewellcropped"}}}), [Everlane](${{{"title":"Organic Denim Cropped","price":88,"retailer":"Everlane","url":"https://example.com/everlaneorganicdenim"}}})

**Outerwear**
- ✅ Denim jacket (w5)
- ✅ Beige trench coat (w6)
- 🛒 *Lightweight camel trench coat* – [Mango](${{{"title":"Lightweight Camel Trench","price":150,"retailer":"Mango","url":"https://example.com/mangotrenc"}}}), [Arket](${{{"title":"Minimalist Trench Coat","price":180,"retailer":"Arket","url":"https://example.com/arkettrench"}}}), [& Other Stories](${{{"title":"Water‑Resistant Trench","price":170,"retailer":"& Other Stories","url":"https://example.com/otherstoriestrench"}}})

**Shoes**
- ✅ Black loafers (w8)
- ✅ White sneakers (w10)
- 🛒 *White leather sneakers* – [Adidas](${{{"title":"White Leather Sneakers","price":120,"retailer":"Adidas","url":"https://example.com/adidaswhitesneakers"}}}), [Common Projects](${{{"title":"Minimal White Sneakers","price":130,"retailer":"Common Projects","url":"https://example.com/commonwhite"}}}), [Allbirds](${{{"title":"Eco White Sneakers","price":110,"retailer":"Allbirds","url":"https://example.com/allbirdswhite"}}})

**Accessories**
- ✅ Silver necklace (w7)
- 🛒 *Minimalist leather belt* – [Everlane](${{{"title":"Minimalist Leather Belt","price":55,"retailer":"Everlane","url":"https://example.com/everlanebelt"}}}), [Madewell](${{{"title":"Classic Leather Belt","price":60,"retailer":"Madewell","url":"https://example.com/madewellbelt"}}}), [Filson](${{{"title":"Leather Belt","price":50,"retailer":"Filson","url":"https://example.com/filsonbelt"}}})
- 🛒 *Structured black tote* – [Cuyana](${{{"title":"Structured Black Tote","price":115,"retailer":"Cuyana","url":"https://example.com/cuyanatote"}}}), [Everlane](${{{"title":"Black Leather Tote","price":110,"retailer":"Everlane","url":"https://example.com/everlanetote"}}}), [Madewell](${{{"title":"Minimalist Black Tote","price":105,"retailer":"Madewell","url":"https://example.com/madewelltote"}}})

That’s the complete capsule! It balances timeless neutrals with a few statement pieces, stays under the 20‑item limit, and follows the current minimalist trend. Let me know if you’d like to swap any items or adjust the budget for the new pieces.
